amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit the United States contribution to the United Nations budget to no more than that of the largest assessed contribution of any other permanent member of the Security Council.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 108-206 to limit the U.S. contribution to the U.N. regular budget (contributions to other U.N. programs would not be affected) to an amount no greater than that paid by any other permanent Security Council member.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 237 (Roll no. 365).
